sections.summary: enthusiastic chemist eager to pursue a lasting career in the agriculture industry. detail-oriented chemist with expertise in the instrumentation, physical and wet chemistry, and formulation as well as coordinating testing and development. highlights hplc uv-vis gc physical chemistry techniques ftir gmp/gcp accomplishments led the pre-formulation and formulation development of a topical cream and gel for psoriases which successfully entered clinical trials.
